safetyTips: All drivers carry hand sanitiser, bags are placed on the doorstep, Driver knocks the door and retreats to a safe distance and waits to see you collect your items.
name: THE BOATHOUSE FISHERIES
address: 1 Teelin Close, St Mary's Bay, Romney Marsh, TN29 0SE
description: We are an independent Fishmonger based in St Mary's bay currently offering free home delivery within a 10 mile radius, this includes Ashford and surrounding villages. Our Facebook page is the perfect place to find all the information you need. Home delivery is Fresh Fish, Cooked ready meals, Eggs and Veg only. Hot food to takeaway is collection only. Please call to place your order, you will receive a call for card payment on delivery day.
